title: Tangent line approximation of a function

content.question: For the function <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>f</mi> <mo>,</mo> <mi>f</mi> <mo>'</mo> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo> <mi>x</mi> <mo stretchy="false">)</mo> <mo>=</mo> <mn>2</mn> <mi>x</mi> <mo>+</mo> <mn>1</mn> </mrow> <annotation>MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaGaamOzaiaacY cacaWGMbGaai4jaiaacIcacaWG4bGaaiykaiabg2da9iaaikdacaWG 4bGaey4kaSIaaGymaaaa@3FD9@</annotation> </semantics> </math> and <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>f</mi> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo> <mn>1</mn> <mo stretchy="false">)</mo> <mo>=</mo> <mn>4</mn> </mrow> <annotation>MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaGaamOzaiaacI cacaaIXaGaaiykaiabg2da9iaaisdaaaa@3AB9@</annotation> </semantics> </math> . What is the approximation for <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>f</mi> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo> <mn>1.2</mn> <mo stretchy="false">)</mo> </mrow> <annotation>MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaGaamOzaiaacI cacaaIXaGaaiOlaiaaikdacaGGPaaaaa@3A63@</annotation> </semantics> </math> found by using the line tangent to the graph of f at <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>x</mi> <mo>=</mo> <mn>1</mn> </mrow> <annotation>MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaGaamiEaiabg2 da9iaaigdaaaa@38B4@</annotation> </semantics> </math> ?
